description: AWS compute costs exceeded budget by 45% due to unoptimized instances
notes: Identified unused instances and right-sized workloads. Implemented auto-scaling policies.

description: Q4 revenue 12% below forecast due to delayed enterprise deals
notes: Three major deals pushed to Q1. Working with sales on acceleration plans.
Approved overage for successful campaign. Adjusted Q2 budget accordingly.
Extended engagement scope. Reviewing SOW compliance.

description: Unusual spike in Q4 travel expenses
notes: Expected increase due to end-of-year customer visits and SKO preparation.
Currency headwinds impacted EUR-denominated contracts. Hedging strategy implemented.

description: Gross margin dropped 3 points below target
notes: Mix shift toward lower-margin professional services. Reviewing pricing strategy.

description: True-up costs for Salesforce exceeded estimates
notes: User audit revealed 45 inactive licenses. Negotiated credit for Q2.

description: Increase in early payment discount utilization
notes: Positive anomaly - Finance team capturing more early payment discounts.
Remote work policy reduced in-office supply needs. Budget to be adjusted.
Resource constraints limited project starts. Hiring plan accelerated.
Added new SIEM and endpoint protection. Approved as part of security roadmap.
